Items.Name: Flame Thrower
Items.Special: On a successful Hit, increase target models HEAT by 1d2. May not be equipped with Specialty Ammunition.

Items.Name: Heavy Weapon
Items.Special: Equipped model may only move at half speed if it fires this weapon this turn. Takes up 2 PFs.

Items.Name: RAIL Weapon
Items.Special: Pick a visible point on the battlefield. Draw a straight line starting from the firing model to the chosen point. Roll one attack for each model and destructible terrain the line passes through. This attack hits friendly models. The firing model gains +1 HEAT when this weapon is used.

Items.Name: A.I. Missile System
Items.Special: When making a Ranged Attack, this weapon does not require line of sight. Ignore any cover bonus.

Items.Name: Long Range Systems
Items.Special: Ignore the -1 CS from firing at Long Range.

Items.Name: Large Missile Battery
Items.Special: When targeting a model, roll to hit with this weapon against all models and terrain within 2" of the original target.

Items.Name: Cable Whip
Items.Special: This weapon has an Engagement range of 3" and may treat enemies as if they are within 1".

Items.Name: Lance
Items.Special: If this model made a Move Action this turn, increase this weapon's Damage by +2, and gains AP for this Action.

Items.Name: Power Weapon
Items.Special: On an attack roll of 1, the power core burns out, losing AP for the rest of the match.

Items.Name: Electric Field
Items.Special: Make an attack against all other models within 2" of you. Each model that takes damage is pushed back 1".

Items.Name: Piston Gauntlet
Items.Special: When this weapon hits, you may move the target model 1" directly away from you.

Items.Name: Energy Sword
Items.Special: Causes Critical Hits on attack rolls of 5+. On an attack roll of 1, the fusion core burns out and this weapon becomes a 1 Damage melee weapon for the rest of the game.

Items.Name: Armor MK I
Items.Special: AR becomes 5+.

Items.Name: Armor MK II
Items.Special: AR becomes 4+.

Items.Name: Reactive Armor
Items.Special: Ignore the first 1 point of Damage this model takes per turn.

Items.Name: VTOL
Items.Special: Ignore terrain when making a Move Action.

Items.Name: Thrusters
Items.Special: Gain +1 Speed.

Items.Name: Heat Sink
Items.Special: New HEAT Check values: 1=2 HEAT, 2=1 HEAT, 3-6=0 HEAT.

Items.Name: Sensor Array
Items.Special: Critical hits deal an extra +1 damage.

Items.Name: Heavy Plating
Items.Special: Increase HP by 1.

Items.Name: Core Stabilizers
Items.Special: Increase your HEAT limit by 2.

Items.Name: Extra Platforms
Items.Special: Increase your model's Platforms by 1. This does not take up a PF slot.

Items.Name: Self Destruct
Items.Special: During your turn if you have 7 or more HEAT, you may make a <Self Destruct Action> and your model explodes.

Items.Name: Camouflage
Items.Special: You may use an action to gain the <Active Camo> status until this model's next action. While under <Active Camo>, enemy models making Ranged attacks modify their CS rolls by -1.

Items.Name: Nuclear Core
Items.Special: When this Mech explodes, it explodes as if it were at HEAT 10.

Items.Name: Targeting System
Items.Special: This model improves their CS rolls by +1.

Items.Name: Up-link
Items.Special: You may spend an Action and target an enemy model in Line of Sight; the target model gains Position Compromised.

Items.Name: Long Range Targeting
Items.Special: When making Ranged Actions, ignore the Long Range rule.

Items.Name: Defense Array
Items.Special: Any time an enemy model gets within 1", roll a d6. On a 4+ the enemy model is instead placed just outside 1".

Items.Name: Thermal Imaging
Items.Special: When targeting a model with 5 or more HEAT, gain +1 to your CS roll.

Items.Name: Counter Missiles
Items.Special: When hit with a ranged critical hit, negate the extra damage from the critical hit.

Items.Name: Virus Program
Items.Special: Once per game: when you activate the model equipped with this Upgrade, you may select an enemy model to infect. The infected model may take only one action this turn. That action cannot be bolstered.
